name: Seesaw (HorizonVEVO)
description:
Seesaw is simple game where the players wonder around a maze and whoever gets to the center first wins, however there is a slight catch, both players are blindfolded!

Of course attemping to compete like is extremely difficult which is why you are offered both a flash with allows you to see a brief period of time and as well a compass to make sure you don't get lost.

Try to remember the map! 
Find the shortest or the best route to the center!
And escape this mysterious maze!

Game developed by:

HorizonVEVO
- Programmer(characters, menus, interactions)
- Artist (Texturing, 2D art)
- Designer(Menus Layout, Maze Design, Visual Esthetic)

Luxludum
- Artist(3D Art)
